title: AntKB
author: AntKB
content: Valuable Investing Magazine - Venture Capital Report (VCR), Issue January 2001, An Once Upon a Time Opportunity of Student.co.uk Taking Investment from Investors. (Student.co.uk is merged after with Student.com)I personally value the Student.co.uk money pitch to subscribed investors of VCR as an exceptional rare artifacts, and also other notable company start-ups, in the Internet Sector from the early 2000's, with an similar value to that of a posh London flat. Â£600,000.00.Please feel free to place an offer for consideration and I welcome the opportunity to answer any questions. https://ibb.co/FwtZR4rhttps://ibb.co/DQRqJThhttps://ibb.co/4JtDb21https://ibb.co/M77nLd8
